entry.title: (ICONIX) - Manner - lyric
entry.content:
When I meet my friend, I say,
"Hello!" / "Hello!"

When my friends come over to my house, I say,
"Let's play together!" / "Let's play together!"

When I make a mistake, I say,
"I'm sorry." / "I'm sorry."

When I see my friends working together, I say,
"Let me help you." / "Let me help you."

When my friend gives me a cookie, I say,
"Thank you!" / "Thank you!"

When I fart, I say,
"Excuse me!" / "Excuse me!"

When I feel good, I say,
"I'm happy." / "I'm happy."

When I see something pretty, I say,
"It's pretty." / "It's pretty."

When I hug my friends, I say,
"I love you." / "I love you."

When I have lunch with my friends, I say,
Enjoy your meal. / Enjoy your meal.

When my friend is going home, I say,
Good bye./ Good bye.

When I go to bed, I say,
"Good night." / "Good night."
